# The `MCRelaxableFragment` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A relaxable fragment holds on to its <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a>, since it may need to be relaxed during the assembler layout and relaxation stage. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MCRelaxableFragment</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A relaxable fragment holds on to its <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a>, since it may need to be relaxed during the assembler layout and relaxation stage.

Definition at line 228 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcfragment-h">MCFragment.h</a>.
